title: Weird FPS/Screen Resolution Issue
body:
Ok so today i jumped into a game of league and the fps was at a consistent 35 FPS, not terrible i know but normally it runs at 100.
 So i have a look online i try to sort things out hardware wise and no luck, so i jumped into a custom game to try and sort things out.
I turned all graphics to low and no change, i changed screen resolution down 1 measure (from 1980-1080 to 1650-1080) and suddenly 100 fps was back, i was surprised so i swapped it back to the original resolution and things were apparently solved.
The issue now is that during games sometimes it will revert to 35 FPS and i have to swap resolutions twice in order to fix it. 
Anybody know how/why this is happening and if there is a fix?

Oh and no other games seem to be effected, at least not that i have noticed

replies.body:
Hey poise36511,

Can you try the solutions in the [**Low Frame Rate (FPS) Troubleshooting**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting) article?
